metadata.title: CVE-2022-2735 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the PCS project. This issue occurs due toincorrect permissions on a Unix socket used for internal communicationbetween PCS daemons. A privilege escalation could happen by obtaining anauthentication token for a hacluster user. With the "hacluster" token, thisflaw allows an attacker to have complete control over the cluster managedby PCS.

criterions.comment: pcs package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
